Posts.EditableText:
Hello there!
I havent found the right answer and its probably just something easy, but im only at the beginning :D
I like to set a picture as my intro, which I think everyone does. But it seems you have to have a text-title for the game. Of course this title shows under my picture. If I leave the title blank, the browser line reads "Untitled Game".
Is there a simple solution to just show my picture?

Thanks in advance :)
Posts.HTML:
Hello there!
I havent found the right answer and its probably just something easy, but im only at the beginning :D
I like to set a picture as my intro, which I think everyone does. But it seems you have to have a text-title for the game. Of course this title shows under my picture. If I leave the title blank, the browser line reads "Untitled Game".
Is there a simple solution to just show my picture?

Thanks in advance :)

Posts.EditableText: You can disable the option "Display title and author when the game begins". Check the Setup tab in the game section
Posts.HTML: You can disable the option "Display title and author when the game begins". Check the Setup tab in the game section
